ticket.title: Trifling typos
ticket.original-body:
While playing with the Rails 3 RC, I found a typo in the rails generator help text. Then, while acking around the Rails project trying to fix it, I found a couple more.
Since a couple of these extremely picky corrections are user-facing, it seemed worthwhile to submit a patch.
